name: SU!
description:
Climb and swing up an endless procedural tower while fending off weird drone things in a psychedelic/cyber punk style world!

You can choose between a more peaceful experience with no enemies or timer where you can climb and swing your way up while enjoying the view.
Or you can try your hand at rushing up the tower before your time runs out and enemies fly at you from all directions.
There are also in-between modes where you can climb endlessly but with enemies trying to stop you or a time trial without having to worry about enemies.
